20110108020038.000|20110108020040.000|CC1|THAT OUTLINE LEGISLATION FOR

20110108020047.000|20110108020048.000|CC1|LEGISLATION WAS ENACTED ON      
20110108020048.000|20110108020050.000|CC1|DECEMBER 17th LAST YEAR.        
20110108020050.000|20110108020054.000|CC1|THE GOVERNMENT WILL INTRODUCE A 
20110108020054.000|20110108020055.000|CC1|DRAFT FOR MEN AND WOMEN AGE 18  
20110108020055.000|20110108020057.000|CC1|AND OLDER.

20110108020100.000|20110108020102.000|CC1|DRAFTED INTO THE ARMY FOR TWO TO
20110108020102.000|20110108020104.000|CC1|THREE YEARS.

20110108020106.000|20110108020108.000|CC1|OF ELIGIBLE AGE EXCEPT THOSE    
20110108020108.000|20110108020110.000|CC1|PHYSICALLY CHALLENGED TO

20110108020153.000|20110108020155.000|CC1|KENICHIRO SASAE MET U.S. SPECIAL
20110108020155.000|20110108020157.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVE FOR NORTH KOREAN 
20110108020157.000|20110108020158.000|CC1|POLICIES STEPHEN BOSWORTH IN    
20110108020158.000|20110108020159.000|CC1|TOKYO ON FRIDAY.

20110108020201.000|20110108020204.000|CC1|CHINA BEFORE FLYING TO JAPAN.

20110108020835.000|20110108020838.000|CC1|A GLOBAL POWER.                 
20110108020838.000|20110108020839.000|CC1|>> Reporter: YOU'RE SAYING THIS 
20110108020839.000|20110108020842.000|CC1|CHINESE GOVERNMENT'S HARD-LINE  
20110108020842.000|20110108020843.000|CC1|DIPLOMACY IS A REFLECTION OF HIS
20110108020843.000|20110108020845.000|CC1|LACK OF CONFIDENCE IN THE

20110108020846.000|20110108020848.000|CC1|IF SO, THE GOVERNMENT MUST BE
